pageProduct.name: Provoke Touch Of Silver Intensive Conditioner 500ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

For best results use PRO:VOKE Touch Of Silver Intensive Conditioner after the Brightening Shampoo. Its rich and luxurious formula improves hair condition after just one treatment and contains restorative proteins which intensively target dry, damaged and coloured hair, leaving it feeling smooth and moisturised.

Common Uses

Touch of Silver Intensive Conditioner contains active conditioning agents, penetrating the hair shaft helping to soften the hair and improving texture. This rich formulation contains Keratin, a hair compatible protein, to help rebuild hair internally. Sunflower Seed Extract & UV Absorber help to protect the structure of the hair and prevent colour fade.

Ingredients

Aqua,Cetearyl Alcohol,Cetrimonium Chloride,Polyquaternium-59,Behentrimonium Chloride,Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract,Wheat Amino Acids,Betaine,Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium,Chloride,Butylene Glycol,Panthenol,Disodium Distyrylbiphenyl Disulfonate,EDTA,Citric Acid,Parfum,Butylphenyl Methylpropional,Linalool,Magnesium Nitrate,Methylchloroisothiazolinone,Potassium Sorbate,Magnesium Chloride,Methylisothiazolinone,Phenoxyethanol,Acid Violet 43

Directions

Use twice a week after the Brightening Shampoo. After shampooing, run conditioner through the length of your hair and rinse thoroughly. For very dry or damaged hair, leave conditioner on for up to 10 minutes
